S0561: No me importa si es un carro rápido.
I don't care if it's a fast car.
S0562: Solo quiero llegar allí con seguridad.
I just want to get there safely.
S0563: No habría podido continuar más tiempo.
I wouldn't have been able to keep going any longer.
S0564: No habría podido sin tu ayuda.
I wouldn't have been able to without your help.
S0565: Habría pensado en ello más cuidadosamente.
I'd have thought about it more carefully.
S0566: Habría pensado más si hubiera sido mi elección.
I'd have thought more if it had been my choice.
S0567: Ha sido encantador pasar tiempo al aire libre observando a los niños jugar.
It's been lovely spending time outdoors watching the children play.
S0568: Espero ver una mejora la próxima vez que nos encontremos.
I'm expecting to see an improvement next time we meet.
S0569: ¿Has decidido cuánto estás dispuesto a pagar?
Have you decided how much you are willing to pay?
S0570: ¿Cuánto estás dispuesto a pagar por tu billete?
How much are you willing to pay for your ticket?

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
